title: Will Warring Kingdom Xin and J4 go on sale in Lunar reveal?

replies.body: They'll be available but not on sale

> [{quoted}](name=Nature,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NmQvnbQp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T10:01:34.227+0000)
>
> They'll be available but not on sale

They are always available
